name: angular-2-daterangepicker
description: Bootstrap Daterange picker for angular2 and 4

scripts.formatter: tsfmt -r daterangepicker-component.ts calendar-component.ts daterangepicker-module.ts index.ts daterangepicker-options.ts time-picker-component.ts index.d.ts
scripts.serve: npm run formatter && rimraf ./dist && tsc -p ./tsconfig.dev.json && concurrently "tsc -p ./tsconfig.dev.json -w" "lite-server"
scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && npm run formatter && tsc -p ./tsconfig.prod.json && cp ./package.json ./dist && cp ./README.md ./dist

author: nikhil.mehta
